title: Jake
description: Jealousy, lust, and teenage insecurities are the lifeblood of any large school. Loneliness can strike without warning, spreading through the cramped corridors like an epidemic. Out on the playground, rivalries are formed from the pettiest of incidents. Some people look at Jake in awe, others look at him with hatred. Jake is just an ordinary boy who wants to be liked. Jake wants to know why the girls never seem to notice him. Jake is... well, he's Jake.
author: Michael Cargill
